## Container.addServices() method

Set multiple services than going to enable an injection of a service in the container and this will be available for usage in all components injectables.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addServices(dependencies: DependencyElement[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dependencies | [DependencyElement](./cloudfunc.dependencyelement.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array of [DependencyElement](./cloudfunc.dependencyelement.md) objects |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
